title: Inuk Quartet : The Snowstorm: Vol 3
description: After the long dark winter Leiv, Narua, Apuluk and Solvi are ready for adventure. They decide to head north with two dogsled teams to see if they can make it to Helluland. But when a terrible blizzard and a shocking kidnap disrupt their journey, the four young travellers must use their courage to get them home.
